happiest_day.explanation: You both experienced a day filled with consistent affection, mutual support, and shared excitement for the future. You started the morning expressing how much joy you get simply from waking up to each other's texts, establishing a loving tone immediately. Throughout the day, you championed each other's professional lives‚Äîencouraging the upcoming presentation and celebrating getting off being on-call at a reasonable hour. The evening was defined by shared happiness, with one of you "having a blast" with friends and immediately wanting to include the other in that joy next time, while the other celebrated a personal win with a "banging" homemade dinner. Above all, the day was underscored by an eagerness to connect through voice notes and a genuine anticipation to see each other on Friday.

most_texts_day.summary:
On October 8, 2025, you two set your all-time daily texting record with a massive 524 messages while Eva was traveling in South America and Mark was back home. It was a day full of excitement for the future, as you busily planned your new home together, discussing everything from couch covers to prioritizing a big comfy bed. You also shared a laugh over a crazy "small world" connection involving Darragh and Ciaran's brother.

Mark, you braved a trip to the dentist (and the dreaded rubber dam!), and though you had a brief moment of feeling a bit off, Eva was right there with unwavering support and a comforting call that helped turn the day around. The rest of the conversation was defined by how much you missed each other‚Äîcounting down the days until your reunion in Cusco, joking about apple cider vinegar cures, and playfully debating an "adult expansion pack" for a card game. It was a day that showed just how strong your connection remained, even oceans apart.

data.summary: In November, your relationship struck a lovely balance between playful teasing and deepening emotional connection. You started the month bonding over gym sessions, sore muscles, and undigested burgers, while playfully competing about running stamina. The month was highlighted by a fun weekend visit that included 'prinks,' a night out in town, and a sweet exchange where Mark brought Eva flowers. You navigated travel logistics between Galway and Dublin, with Eva stepping in to drive to Powerscourt to save Mark the energy. Most importantly, you shared a significant, honest conversation that you both appreciated, leaving you excited to see each other again despite a looming cold sore scare.
data.memorable_moment: The trip to Powerscourt, where Eva picked Mark up to save him from driving after his trip from Galway, leading to a lovely day out and a meaningful conversation.
data.nice_text: Thanks! And thanks a mil for today too, had another super lovely time and really glad we had that chat, I really appreciate you being upfront about it and being so understanding.

data.summary: In December 2024, your relationship was defined by a blend of domestic troubleshooting and the excitement of making things official. You supported each other through mundane headaches like check engine lights, broken freezers, and long work weeks, all while coordinating meetups around train schedules and hangovers. The vibe shifted from casual hangouts to a celebration of your new status, ending the month on a high note as you shared the happy news with friends and family before ringing in the New Year.
data.memorable_moment: The aftermath of 'the asking' when you made your relationship official, leaving Eva smiling ear-to-ear at the bus stop and Mark's parents 'over the moon' about the news.
data.nice_text: I was honestly smiling ear to ear waiting for the bus I'm so happy and excited for us ü•∞

data.summary: Your January kicked off with a chaotic but affectionate New Year's, where despite being apart, you were obsessively talking about each other to anyone who would listen. You navigated the aftermath of a wild night‚Äîincluding Mark's swollen nose and Eva's hungover bus journey‚Äîwith humor and mutual support. As the month progressed, your bond deepened through shared excitement over Mark's new full-time job news and late-night sentimental texts, proving that you are building something special and supportive while eagerly counting down the minutes until your next cuddle.
data.memorable_moment: Realizing on New Year's Day that you had both spent the previous night drunkenly bragging about your relationship to everyone‚Äîfrom Mark's friends at Sam's party to the random strangers Eva cornered in Galway.

data.summary: In March, your relationship was defined by deep emotional support, music, and anticipation for your upcoming travels. You focused on mental well-being, encouraging each other to use journaling and get early nights to process big emotions, reinforcing your belief that you can get through anything together. You shared sentimental music recommendations and coordinated the logistics for your trip to Malta, managing disappointment over the rainy forecast with optimism and humor. Despite a rough day at work and some last-minute packing procrastination, you prioritized comforting each other with cuddles and excitement for your getaway.
data.memorable_moment: The night before your flight to Malta on March 25th, when Mark offered a 'big huge enormous bear hug' to help fix a bad day at work while you both scrambled to finish packing.
data.nice_text: One of my favourites of all time and I now can't help but associate it with you cause of how happy you make me üíõ

You both balanced work stress and course mishaps‚Äîlike Mark ending up in the wrong room‚Äîwith constant reassurance and humor. data.summary: In May 2025, your relationship was defined by a lovely mix of dreamy future planning and supportive daily connection. You spent time sharing links to multi-million euro dream homes in Dundrum and Killiney, joking about how obsessive you will be when you eventually buy one. There was a lot of excitement building for an upcoming trip, with Eva sending packing guides and reminders for swimming togs. Despite busy schedules involving family gatherings, 'prinks,' and concerts, you kept each other close with long voice notes and sweet check-ins. You also bonded over small joys like 'elite' pizza, dodging rain showers with croissant bags, and ensuring you both felt supported and loved.

data.summary: In July, your relationship was defined by a mix of romantic anticipation and unwavering support during a crisis. You started the month counting down the hours until you could reunite after long travels and a Noah Kahan concert, managing to squeeze in a cozy sleepover despite tight work schedules. When the weekend plans hit a snag with a car breakdown in Waterford, you worked together seamlessly; one of you handled the roadside stress while the other stepped up to secure AA membership and a towing plan. Despite the chaos, you prioritized each other's peace of mind and ended the month ready to enjoy your bank holiday festival camping trip.
data.memorable_moment: The collaborative effort to solve the car breakdown in Portlaw, where you navigated insurance issues and arranged a rescue plan so you could still enjoy the festival.
data.nice_text: I wish I was there sm too, you'll be getting the absolute biggest hug tomorrow when I see you

While Mark was adventuring in Panama, battling humidity and nosebleeds, Eva was holding down the fort at home, preparing for future travels with vaccines and managing work shifts in Mullingar. You both put effort into staying connected, sharing music recommendations and trying to squeeze in calls between boat trips and dentist appointments, all while coordinating upcoming plans for a reunion in Galway.

You both expressed immense pride in how gracefully you handled the separation and finished the month buzzing with anticipation to finally be back in each other's arms.

Despite the distance, you stayed connected through updates on daily life, from washing clothes and enjoying a sauna to debating the merits of different floral duvet covers.
